meanings.definition: A substance applied to the skin to prevent or reduce sweating.
meanings.sent1: I used antiperspirant before going for a run to stop sweating.
meanings.sent2: She always carries antiperspirant in her bag to stay fresh.
meanings.sent3: The antiperspirant worked like magic, keeping me dry all day.
meanings.sent4: His determination was like an antiperspirant, stopping any signs of weakness.
meanings.sent5: The antiperspirant shielded me from the embarrassment of sweat stains.

meanings.definition: A product used to control perspiration and body odor.
meanings.sent1: My favorite antiperspirant has a refreshing scent.
meanings.sent2: After using antiperspirant, I felt more confident about my smell.
meanings.sent3: The antiperspirant danced with my body odor, creating a unique fragrance.
meanings.sent4: Her charm acted like an antiperspirant, masking any unpleasantness.
meanings.sent5: The antiperspirant became my trusted ally in the battle against sweat.
